issue.title: Compilation is broken on default branch for Xenial/Wily

content.raw: I assume that you mean to add xenial to the pull-request CI pipeline. The -ci-default jobs run daily and cover other platforms that are not the reference that we use for pr CI (currently trusty). We could add xenial to the PR testing at the cost of adding some overhead to the farm. I'm currently ok having only one linux platform in the PR CI pipeline since problems with different Ubuntu versions appear rarely.
content.html: I assume that you mean to add xenial to the pull-request CI pipeline. The -ci-default jobs run daily and cover other platforms that are not the reference that we use for pr CI (currently trusty). We could add xenial to the PR testing at the cost of adding some overhead to the farm. I'm currently ok having only one linux platform in the PR CI pipeline since problems with different Ubuntu versions appear rarely.
